title: I CANT LOG IN
body:
I CANT LOG IN,IT SAYS USERNAME OR PASSWORD INCORRECT BUT I CAN LOG IN HERE TO POST ON BOARDS
HELP ME I WAS MID RANKED GAME

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Omnis,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=VG3fzMNs,comment-id=,timestamp=2018-05-15T19:11:07.284+0000)
>
> I CANT LOG IN,IT SAYS USERNAME OR PASSWORD INCORRECT BUT I CAN LOG IN HERE TO POST ON BOARDS
> HELP ME I WAS MID RANKED GAME

Happened to me too, so I made a thread here as wellto se if anyone else was experiencing issues.  I changed my password a few times and it finally worked.  Glad to see I'm not the only one that's experiencing problems, though.

Reboot system and try again, could be some weird error.

If it persists, try changing your password from the website.
